name: The 7th Int’l Power Engineering and Automation Conference
content: The 7th Int’l Power Engineering and Automation Conference (PEAM 2024) will be held during April 19-21, 2024 in Xiamen, China. This Conference will cover issues on Power Engineering and Automation, and other related topics. It dedicates to creating a stage for exchanging the latest research results and sharing the advanced research methods in related fields.
